level.description: One of the colors in the Robot Color Database is invalid. Use the <color=#00ff00ff>COMMENTER</color> tool to see which colors don't affect the bug. Then, use the <color=#ff00ffff>WARPER</color> tool to travel to the affected color groups. Check the RGB values and use the BUGCATCHER to catch the bug.
level.introtext: One bug remains, but it is well hidden. You'll have to comment code to Divide-and-Conquer. Can you combine all your tools to find it?
level.endtext: Fantastic! All the bugs have been found. The Database is fully functional once again!
